it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.persistence.repository

Interface PortfolioRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<PortfolioEntity,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<PortfolioEntity,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<PortfolioEntity,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
 @Transactional
public interface PortfolioRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<PortfolioEntity,java.lang.Long>
    This interface offers methods to retrieve data from the portfolio table in the database.
    Author:
    Cristian Laurini, Luca Antilici

      • sumValues

        @Query(value="SELECT NEW it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.persistence.util.Value(p.date, SUM(p.value)) FROM PortfolioEntity p WHERE p.user = ?1 GROUP BY p.date")
java.util.List<Value> sumValues(UserEntity user)
        This method allows to retrieve the sum of values for each set of portfolios of the specified user grouped by date.
        Parameters:
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you get the values.
        Returns:
        List of Value.

      • sumValues

        @Query(value="SELECT NEW it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.persistence.util.Value(p.date, SUM(p.value)) FROM PortfolioEntity p WHERE p.user = ?1 AND p.date = ?2")
Value sumValues(UserEntity user,
                                                                                                                                                                                  java.time.LocalDate date)
        This method allows to retrieve the sum of values for each set of portfolios of the specified user in a specific date.
        Parameters:
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you get the value.
        date - LocalDate is the date for which you get the value.
        Returns:
        Value that has BigDecimal value and LocalDate date.

      • sumValuesForAssetClass

        @Query(value="SELECT NEW it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.persistence.util.Value(p.date, SUM(p.value)) FROM PortfolioEntity p WHERE p.user = ?2 AND p.assetClass = ?1 GROUP BY p.date")
java.util.List<Value> sumValuesForAssetClass(AssetClassEntity assetClass,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     UserEntity user)
        This method allows to retrieve the sum of values for each set of portfolios of the specified user and the specified asset class grouped by date.
        Parameters:
        assetClass - AssetClassEntity is the assetClass for wich you get the values.
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you get the values.
        Returns:
        List of Value.

      • sumValuesForAssetClass

        @Query(value="SELECT NEW it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.persistence.util.Value(p.date, SUM(p.value)) FROM PortfolioEntity p WHERE p.user = ?2 AND p.date = ?3 AND p.assetClass = ?1")
Value sumValuesForAssetClass(AssetClassEntity assetClass,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     UserEntity user,

      • findByUserAndDate

        java.util.List<PortfolioEntity> findByUserAndDate(UserEntity user,
                                                  java.time.LocalDate date)
        This method allows to retrieve all the portfolios for a specific user in the selected date.
        Parameters:
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you want to retrieve the portfolios.
        date - LocalDate is the date for which you want to retrieve the portfolios.

        List of PortfolioEntities.

      • findByUserAndDateBetween

        java.util.List<PortfolioEntity> findByUserAndDateBetween(UserEntity user,
                                                         java.time.LocalDate finalDate,
                                                         java.time.LocalDate initialDate)
        This method allows to retrieve all the portfolios for a specific user in selected period of time between initialDate and finalDate.
        Parameters:
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you want to retrieve the portfolios.
        finalDate - LocalDate is the last date of the desired period.
        initialDate - LocalDate is the starting date of the desired period.
        Returns:
        List of PortfolioEntities.

      • findByUserAndAssetAndDate

        PortfolioEntity findByUserAndAssetAndDate(UserEntity user,
                                          AssetEntity asset,
                                          java.time.LocalDate date)
        This method allows to retrieve the portfolio for a specific user and an asset in the selected date.
        Parameters:
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you want to retrieve the portfolio.
        asset - AssetEntity is the asset for which you want to retrieve the portfolio.
        date - LocalDate is the date for which you want to retrieve the portfolio.
        Returns:
        PortfolioEntity.
